reviews.sentence: Excellent location close to beach cruise lines. This is a great hotel if you are taking a cruise. We stayed the night before our cruise and had an easy 15 minute cab ride to the ship the next morning. Plus you can walk two blocks to the beach. And the hotel gives you towels for the beach. Room was large comfortable and staff was responsive.

Clinton Hotel is where it is at. While I stayed at the Clinton in 2013 I vividly remember everything about the hotel. Everything about it was perfect. I traveled with two friends and our room was absolutely HUGE. I had have to say Hotel Clinton definitely set the standard in hotels of which my friends and I are accustomed to when we travel to South Beach Miami. We were greeted from a friendly staff and were placed on the 2nd floor which is perfect for us since we do not really sleep when we go to Miami. We LOVED the pool while small it was still perfect. They had hookahs and an Open Bar between 7PM and 8PM which was perfect and we took advantage of as I would tell everyone who stays here to do so. The food at the restaurant was great and we loved every second spent there. As we left we were given a business card that granted us a discount for the next time we stayed at Clinton. we have tried to book the hotel again however the price of the hotel has gone up since 2013 and I do not blame them. We felt as if we were undercharged back in 2013 and now it is too expensive for us to stay but if we had the money we had definitely stay there again so if you have the money BOOK IT.

Looks can be deceiving. The site and the actual place look different. The location is good but be careful we checked out of the hotel in the morning my boyfriend left a pair of pants by mistake in the closet and I called later that afternoon and NOBODY knew where the pants were. Make sure you do not leave anything behind. Location. Honesty of the staff.

helpful staff clean room great location. SWF in South Beach on business. Front desk concierge and valet were all very helpful. I checked in early with no hassle checked out late on my last day. My room was clean and the cleaning ladies were very pleasant and helpful – even helped me carry bags when I was coming and leaving. The location is perfect – close to shopping restaurants and beach. I would recommend this for a casual visit and I would bring my teenagers. Very good value for the price. For a super romantic getaway I would recommend one of the more upscale hotels. But for anything else I will definitely be back.

Never Again. The Clinton Hotel was suggested by a friend who organized my bachelorette weekend because of the special offers that were provided with booking which included airport shuttle service happy hour free drinks VIP club access and daily breakfast. Well the shuttle service had limited hours of operation the free drinks were in small cups filled with ice and juice club access was for a local spot where entrance was free and the daily breakfast consisted of a loaf of bread a bag of bagels jar of jelly tub of butter juice and a toaster. But nevermind all that the reason I will never stay again is because I entered the room only to see a huge puddle of water created from a leaking AC. Stains were on the bedspread and a majority of the towels. I had to call for an ironing board and luggage stand. The bathroom tile was old and the ice bucket did not contain a bag To add insult to injury I saw a big bug in the room the day I was packing to leave after my three night stay. I encourage you to spend the extra money for peace of mind clean towels and a clean room. Location was good. An entire remodel facelift.

Nice hotel close to beach restaurants shopping. Very convenient location just around the corner to restaurants shopping and the beautiful beach. Free airport shuttle runs 9am4pm. free breakfast simple bagel cream cheese or toast and coffee. free beach chair towel rental I believe included in the resort fee. Super fast simple and easy check in and check out. Very convenient to book tours with Joel or Leiker who are such wonderful help in booking tours or recommending places to eat. did not end up spending a lot of time in the room except for sleeping modest but clean and comfortable room on a budget with excellent location. Recommended.

Good location and that is about it. good location cheap price. When we got to the hotel we checked in fast and went to our room. The room was not impressive and there was hair in the bathroom and water stains on the table. I felt the need to check to make sure the bed and pillows were clean. it is a good location and the noise outside did not bother us it was loud for an hour max. Would recommend only for the location.
Close to everything. Things were a bit worn down. Breakfast was a joke. Had to access room via a door through the outside. Room was spacious with a couch.
Great staff. Very acomadating staff and big rooms. My guests and I enjoyed our stay.

Poor. We did not like any thing about this hotel. They claim they have shuttle service from the hotel to the airport THEY have not please do not get caught like we did. in our room as you come out of the bathroom you feel you are falling that s because the floor slopes down by 6 inches towards the door. The staff come in to clean the room but they only make the beds. The door to the room had a big gap all the way round did not close properly and very noise door slamming going on poorly maintained. do not be dazzled by the nice lobby or you will be disappointed once you step in to the very slow lift.

You get for what you pay for. Location and value was the best part. Room was roomy. The concept was great but the property was not kept up. The canals outside the balcony and by the pool was very nice but they were not on and dry. Breakfast was very limited and no restaurant or bar on premises.
The worst hotel ever. IF you stay here you will be sorry the rooms are dirty and small only have one elevator nothing great location do not let it fool you everything.

Location was ok but it is very dirty. We got there and the room was very dirty to the point that we find 2 bugs and I told them there room is dirty and there is bugs they can with me saw the bugs wh said sorry we are all books otherwise I will offer you another room they did not have a room maid at 5 pm i left the hotel and cam back after 2 hours they promised to clean it but when I can back they only spry with smell and they did not even removed the 2 bugs I killed when the recipientnest came with me to see the room anyway I went to CVS and got supplies to sanetize the room. so anyway if you wana live with bugs inside the room then book this hotel. Good luck.

The one night we stayed was not unbearable but another night would have been too much. The room had a terrible smell and any time the shower was used it smelled like sewer. The elevator was extremely small and the room itself needs so true renovation. The size of the room was great and the nice sized couch was definitely a plus. However the room did not feel very sanitary. it is a great location to stay a night just if you have to for a cheap price compared to other hotels in the area but you definitely get what you pay for if not a little less.

the room that I was given was located very close to the hotels garbage bins so every day at 8 am I was waking up to the garbage truck picking up the trash. there were no electricity plugs by the bed to charge the cell phone they are inconveniently located at the other end of the room. the room was very clean but the hallway was not. the staff were mostly very helpful and nice. the pool is very small. the location is great but I did not get to rest at all during my stay most likely I will not stay there again.

Would not recommend to anyone. Here are the things1. There were no towels in the room. I had to call the front desk2. There were no batteries in the tv remote. I had to take it to the front desk. They were quick to fulfill the request however it should have been checked before the room was ocupied3. The bed was so close to the clothes closet that I could barely open the dors4. The elevator broke down on the day just before I checked out5. The coffee coffee machine was a joke. The pods were too small for the filter. Thus the coffee was mostly water6. I had to call the front desk for instruction on the WIFI. The password was the room number and the hotel name. Mine was the only room number not listed on the connections. I used another room number7. Everything is very old and is not pleasant to look at. Location. Everything.

Low expectations. The first thing they did not have my room ready after I had arrive into the hotel they told me I had to wait an hour after check in unbelievable I reserver this for a long time how is my room not ready on time. The pool area looks nasty like they do not clean it at all. The sheets of the room were also nasty full of dirty marks. I never coming back. and I will never recommend either.

Upset diapointed. This hotel is terrible. The pictures definitely lie to you. The hotel was filthy there where gnats flying around all through my room the whole weekend. Please read the reviews. I learned the hard way stayed here anyway. Do your safe a favor pay more for something you will feel comfortable staying in. They lie about all the accommodations as far as bath robs breakfast you name it. The breakfast was dry bagels toast cereal. None of the items we where told. Never stay here again is all I am going to say. do not do it. read the reviews they are not lying.

Not impressed expected more for the price. Did not like this hotel. We arrived at 7 pm and there was no one at the front desk. After a few min a lady came out of a back room and checked us in. We asked about valet parking and she did not know where the cars were taken to be parked she just said it was not anywhere close by. The elevator and hallways reeked of weed. Once we got into the room the AC temp was set to very low probably to kill that old smell we smelt a few moments after increasing the temp. The bathroom sink would not drain. The bedding was VERY comfortable though. do not be fooled by the pool that is offered it is more of a little 4fet deep bath tub very small. The pictures shown here are definitely over exaggerated. The location was pretty cool close to all the stores on Collins Ave and close enough to Ocean Dr yet far enough from all the noise and craziness. There is an excellent Cuban restaurant one block over Manolos on the corner of Washington Ave and 7th St Great breakfast spot just in case you want something other than regular continental breakfast offered by the hotel.

AMAZING SERVICE. Due to a conference meeting I was scheduled to be in Miami last minute but this hidden little gem turned my business trip into the most pleasurable time I have had in a while. I was welcomed with a bottle of wine in my room which was much needed after being jet lagged but nonetheless I was upgraded up front at no cost. Everything is NEW NEW NEW fully renovated I am surely impressed coming from an Art Deco boutique hotel.

Lovely place can not wait to return. The continental breakfast was superb. The new renovated lobby is amazing relaxing with a tropical atmosphere. The front desk team welcomed us with open arms made our stay marvelous. And the rooms are small but comfortable. It was a bit challenging to find park but manageable.

Great location small room. We used a parking structure one block away it was safe and very reasonable. Staff are courteous and friendly. Room is small with modern furnishings. Bathroom lacks counter space and storage but the towels are luxuriously soft and the shower is most comfortable. While the pool is tiny we did not have a need for it as the beach is just a few blocks away. Loved the Location perfect spot for the Art Deco walking tour.

Nice update rooms and great location. The location was great only a few blocks from the beach and right in the middle of all the action. Rooms were very nice and freshly updated. Staff was very friendly. The breakfast was very simple.

Awesome Staff. It was my first trip to Miami and they were very helpful. Told us all about the popular things to doAnd places to visit. As soon as we checked in we were escorted to our rooms. They handled our bags getting up to our room as well. We used the valet parking services and everything just all ran smoothly. I will book again.
Clean and neat room.
Great location. Great for a family holiday only the pool is more like a bath tub so forget about that. Location is great and close to good restaurants and short walk of Ocean Drive.

I was skeptical about choosing this hotel because many of the reviews complained about room size. It was a girls trip so having a spacious room was important to me. When we got there they gave us an upgrade and the room was absolutely perfect. Very very clean comfortable beds and the bathroom shower was my favorite. The hotel is two blocks away from the beach and is in close proximity to the mall fast food and more. We were next door to a smoothie shop and subway which I got nearly every morning. However do not bother with the pool it can pretty much only fit two people. The free breakfast does not include much either more like just a bagel and orange juice.
Staff was great rooms were clean and comfy. I would definitely stay here again.
Great location and staff. The staff were friendly and helpful. Room was clean and spacious. Would totally go back.
Cozy accommodations. Although the bathroom door did not close all the way the shower was nice and hot.
Excellent location and rooms are huge. The bed the bathroom and the location. I think the exterior and the corridors need revamping.

For the price it was not bad. The beds were comfortable and the room was nice. The food at the adjoining restaurant was good but one of the bartenders did not seem to understand how to give back your coins when you payed your bill.
